name: General Physician
description: As the part of general practice, all the patients can come here. Prescriptions are made upon investigating thoroughly the patient. If needed referred for  diagnostic tests.

name: General surgery
description: General surgeons have such broad knowledge, they perform a variety of emergency procedures. You may see a general surgeon if you have appendicitis, a hernia, gallstones, or even a gunshot wound..

name: Medical checkup
description: Regular check-ups can help find potential health issues before they become a problem. When you see your doctor regularly, they are able to detect health conditions or diseases early. Early detection gives you the best chance for getting the right treatment quickly, avoiding any complications

name: Gyn Care
description: Infertility management and IVF procedures are handled with most priority.  With the experience of special Gynoecology Training, people are served with the most priority and care
